topology:
根据网络拓扑图分析，增强后的网络拓扑描述如下：

**网络拓扑描述：**

本网络由5台路由器设备组成，全部运行OSPF协议并属于骨干区域Area 0。网络采用环形拓扑结构，具体连接关系如下：

**设备连接关系：**
- DeviceA通过interface1(10.1.2.2/24)连接DeviceC的interface1(10.1.2.1/24)
- DeviceA通过interface3(10.1.4.2/24)连接DeviceD的interface1(10.1.4.1/24)  
- DeviceB通过interface1(192.168.0.1/24)连接DeviceC的interface1(192.168.0.2/24)
- DeviceB通过interface1(192.168.1.1/24)连接DeviceE的interface1(192.168.1.2/24)
- DeviceC通过interface2(192.168.1.2/24)连接DeviceE的interface2(192.168.1.1/24)
- DeviceC通过interface3(192.168.2.1/24)连接DeviceD的interface2(192.168.2.2/24)
- DeviceD通过interface3(192.168.3.1/24)连接DeviceE的interface3(192.168.3.2/24)
- DeviceE通过interface4(172.17.1.1/24)提供外部连接

**IP地址分配：**
- 10.1.2.0/24网段：DeviceA与DeviceC互连
- 10.1.4.0/24网段：DeviceA与DeviceD互连  
- 192.168.0.0/24网段：DeviceB与DeviceC互连
- 192.168.1.0/24网段：DeviceB与DeviceE互连
- 192.168.1.0/24网段：DeviceC与DeviceE互连
- 192.168.2.0/24网段：DeviceC与DeviceD互连
- 192.168.3.0/24网段：DeviceD与DeviceE互连
- 172.17.1.0/24网段：DeviceE外部接口

**负载分担实现：**
DeviceA到DeviceE存在两条等价路径：
1. DeviceA → Dev
requirement: 配置负载分担，使得 DeviceA 的流量可以分别通过 DeviceC 和 DeviceD 发送到 DeviceE。
steps: 在各路由器上配置 OSPF 基本功能，实现互连。
在 DeviceA 上配置负载分担功能。
在 DeviceA 上配置等价路由的优先级。
在 DeviceA 上配置逐包的负载分担方式。

configs.DeviceA:
#
sysname DeviceA
#
router id 1.1.1.1
#
interface GigabitEthernet1/0/
 undo shutdown
 ip address 10.1.1.1 255.255.255.0
#
interface GigabitEthernet2/0/
 undo shutdown
 ip address 10.1.2.1 255.255.255.0
#
interface GigabitEthernet3/0/
 undo shutdown
 ip address 10.1.3.1 255.255.255.0
#
ospf
 maximum load-balancing 2
 nexthop 10.1.1.2 weight 2
 nexthop 10.1.2.2 weight 1
 nexthop 10.1.3.2 weight 1
 area 0.0.0.0
  network 10.1.1.0 0.0.0.255
  network 10.1.2.0 0.0.0.255
  network 10.1.3.0 0.0.0.255
#
return
configs.DeviceB:
#
sysname DeviceB
#
router id 2.2.2.2
#
interface GigabitEthernet1/0/
 undo shutdown
 ip address 10.1.1.2 255.255.255.0
#
interface GigabitEthernet2/0/
 undo shutdown
 ip address 192.168.0.1 255.255.255.0
#
ospf
 area 0.0.0.0
  network 10.1.1.0 0.0.0.255
  network 192.168.0.0 0.0.255.255
#
return
configs.DeviceC:
#
sysname DeviceC
#
router id 3.3.3.3
#
interface GigabitEthernet1/0/
 ip address 10.1.2.2 255.255.255.0
#
interface GigabitEthernet2/0/
 undo shutdown
 ip address 192.168.1.1 255.255.255.0
#
ospf
 area 0.0.0.0
  network 10.1.2.0 0.0.0.255
  network 192.168.1.0 0.0.0.255
#
return
configs.DeviceD:
#
sysname DeviceD
#
router id 4.4.4.4
#
interface GigabitEthernet1/0/
 undo shutdown
 ip address 10.1.3.2 255.255.255.0
#
interface GigabitEthernet2/0/
 undo shutdown
 ip address 192.168.2.1 255.255.255.0
#
ospf
 area 0.0.0.0
  network 10.1.3.0 0.0.0.255
  network 192.168.2.0 0.0.0.255
#
return
configs.DeviceE:
#
sysname DeviceE
#
router id 5.5.5.5
#
interface GigabitEthernet1/0/
 undo shutdown
 ip address 192.168.0.2 255.255.255.0
#
interface GigabitEthernet2/0/
 undo shutdown
 ip address 192.168.1.2 255.255.255.0
#
interface GigabitEthernet3/0/
 undo shutdown
 ip address 192.168.2.2 255.255.255.0
#
interface GigabitEthernet1/0/
 undo shutdown
 ip address 172.17.1.1 255.255.255.0
#
ospf
 area 0.0.0.0
  network 192.168.0.0 0.0.255.255
  network 192.168.1.0 0.0.0.255
  network 192.168.2.0 0.0.0.255
  network 172.17.1.0 0.0.0.255
#
return
